About Us

Join Our Shining Sprouts Academy

for age 0 - 3 years old.

We Offer :

  • Our Hot Meals are provided by a company called 'Little Dinners.
  • We supply baby wipes, cotton wool and nappy bags.
  • We have highly competent and qualified staffs.
  • We provide our employees with First Aid, HACCP, Manual Handling, Health and Safety, Fire Safety and Child Protection Training to ensure the safety of the children in our care.
  • Our centre is registered with the appropriate regulatory bodies such as the HSE, TUSLA and comply with all regulations.
